my mother was a school music teacher.
my hobby is sewing.
i live in a rural community.
I am a hard worker and I am proud of my accomplishments.

participant_2.background:
I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
my major was american literature and education.
My landlord is raising my rent, so I bought a used Ford Focus to save money.
I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them.
my father died when i was 2.

content.text: Nice to meet you, [participant_1]! I'm [participant_1]. What are your hobbies?
I love to read, go for walks with my dogs, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to sew and fish. I used to live in a rural community, but now I live in a city.

I've always wanted to learn how to sew! My father died when I was very young, and my mother was a school music teacher. She taught me how to read and play the piano, but she never had the time to teach me how to sew.
That's a shame. It's a great skill to have. I learned how to sew when I was in high school. I took a class and I loved it.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great seamstress.
Thanks! I'm not too bad. I make a lot of clothes for my friends and family.
That's really nice of you. I'm sure they appreciate it.
They do. It's a lot of fun to be able to make things for people.
I can imagine. I love making my dogs' beds.
That's a great idea! I'm sure your dogs love them.
They do! They're always so happy when I bring them out.
I'm sure they are. Dogs are the best.
